channel.title: Setting up my server
channel.description:
Hello Moparscapers,
I asked this a long time before but didn't had any help :( My question is when I buy a vps how do I set up my server then?
1. How do I get my files on the vps computer 2. How can I portforward it? Or is it already portforwarded? 3. How do I use a no-ip?
Please someone help me out! Thnx
Rick

item.title: Setting up my server
item.dc:creator: @whip_of_soulz whip of soulz
item.description:
@whip_of_soulz wrote:

[quote=“Coolrick, post:4, topic:340373”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=436743.msg3208805#msg3208805 date=1274041459]

  1. No-Ip.com, make an account and add a host.
    [/quote] Only this? so no downloads or something?[/quote]
    You need to download No-ip DUC.

[quote=“freakinlost, post:3, topic:340373”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

shows you how to do it step by step[/quote]
ur an idiot

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up my server
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

  1. Use an upload site Ex. uppit.com
  2. Should be port forwarded, might have to open 43594 via firewall
  3. No-Ip.com, make an account and add a host.

Read full topic
